title: Privacy policy
description:
Your data is only yours. We do not collect any data in the application. All data is saved locally on your device, if you want you can create a backup of data and put it where you want. Only you can manage your data. We do not have access to your device's features. We collect only anonymous (analytical and crash) data of app usage.

Premium version

Premium account may only be used with one iCloud account. After purchase, you can use the app on every iOS device with your account. After one-time payment, you will have access to all premium features and all-new features after updates.
